issue.title: Gazebo GUI Position PID controller Integrated term not cleared when world reset

content.raw:
In addition to resetting the PID's, [JointController::Reset](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f4e51e8f64001beda70615ab8982a7d5a4e65b18/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#JointController.cc-111:132) will reset the PID set-points and joint forces, which I'm not sure is what we want.

I think we may need to add an API to `JointController` that clears the accumulated PID error without clearing everything else.
content.html:
In addition to resetting the PID's, JointController::Reset will reset the PID set-points and joint forces, which I'm not sure is what we want.

I think we may need to add an API to JointController that clears the accumulated PID error without clearing everything else.
